summary: Recent events—such as the ransomware attack on the Colonial pipeline—illustrate the pressing need to strengthen federal cybersecurity and IT management. These issues are on our High Risk List , and we have often told the government to urgently pursue action on them. In our biannual testimony to Congress, we reported that many of these key recommendations have yet to be fully implemented. For example, the...
title: Cybersecurity and Information Technology: Federal Agencies Need to Strengthen Efforts to Address High-Risk Areas
